H1.text: Chemistry is the branch of science that Maria Mitchell's 1847 comet discovery, later named after her, contributed to.

H2.text: Geology is the branch of science to which Maria Mitchell's discovery of a comet in 1847, later named after her, contributed.

H3.text: Astronomy is the branch of science to which Maria Mitchell contributed when she discovered a comet in 1847 that was later named after her.

A4.text: Maria Mitchell was an astronomer who discovered a comet in 1847.

A5.text: Mitchell was the first woman to work as a professor of astronomy.
